title: A Family of Tokyo
creator_contributor_role: Japan. Ministry of Foreign Affairs, production company

description: A working day and a holiday in the life of a Japanese middle-class family of a husband, wife and three school-age children. Shows the respective status, roles and functions of family members and the ble.ding of the traditional and modern in family life
